task.title: Picking Up Your Permanent Library Card
task.shortdesc: Your permanent card will expire after 30 days, so you will need to acquire a permanent library card.

step.cmd: Call your home library to ensure that they have recieved your application and learn of any branch specific procedures

step.note: Each library branch has a slightly different procedure, so if you have not called ahead it is not recommended to proceed to picking up your permanent card.
step.cmd: Visit your home library and present your proof of insurance according to the aforementioned procedures
After completing the in-person verification process, verify that your library card number and status have been updated to match your permanent card.
